name: TGV Connections: Le Sud Ouest Express
name_original: TGV Connections: Le Sud Ouest Express
description:
Made with Arkhann and Shrrignien during the Alakajam x Scorespace jam in june 2020 ! 

Our drag and drop is moody (we know...) so:

CLICK ONCE TO SELECT THE CARD, AND CLICK ON THE CARD YOU WANT TO CONNECT IT TO. 

Thanks :) 

Like a lot. 

Contre la privatisation de la SNCF.
